dict.acceptation: 用帐蓬遮盖；向…供应帐逢；将塞条嵌进（伤口）；观察，看护，照料；

sent.orig: Our products have four series: Camping Tent, Beach Tent, Children Tent and office Stationary.
sent.trans: 我们的产品涉及四个系列：沙滩帐篷，野营帐篷，儿童帐篷和办公文具。

sent.orig: He went into his tent and closed the flap of the tent Behind him.
sent.trans: 他走进帐篷，放下了垂帘。

sent.orig: When putting up the tent, the tent poles are hard to deal with.
sent.trans: 搭帐篷的时候，帐篷的支架是很难支起的。

sent.orig: He stalked over to the pup tent of the recreation tent orderly and bawled him out.
sent.trans: 他气昂昂来到管娱乐室那个勤务兵住的小帐篷里，给了他一顿熊。

sent.orig: Carrying a tent, a bag and clothes, you can travel at your own decision.
sent.trans: 带上一个帐篷，一个睡袋和衣服，你就能根据你自己的意愿随意旅行。
